page.title: 05Southend:The High Street 1
page.content:
{The High Street}is the main shopping centre of Southend.It is mainly pedestrianised with a covered precinct at one end.The shops are distributed as follows: no: 5 10 15 20 25 30 foodstores:|___ (9) clothing :|__________________(27) department:|___ (9) luxury :|__ (6) banks etc.:|_ (5) others :|__ (6)
{The covered precinct}is called "Victoria Circus"and contains many other shops as well as those shown above.The precinct is three storeys high and was built in the early seventies. Recently,the main part of the High Street has been pedestrianised for the convenience of the shoppers.
